column4: I am totally new to this, its running an a very old (AMD Duron) machine and when i try and install or run an exe file it fails
So Ubuntu can't run an .iso file from a click? Windows can <_<
i don't know but give a try to this dd if=image.iso of=/dev/sdb -b1024  at sdb just put the usb u have on your system
after try to boot from usb key
try k3b to burn the iso on cd
or brasero, it's installed by default
